titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Papers, 1931-1939 and n.d.
titlestmt.author: Processed by: Rubenstein Staff; EAD finding aid derived from MARC record using marc2ead_sectionA.xsl

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid derived from MARC record via marc2ead_sectionA.xsl December 2016

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.abstract: Letter concerning school teachers of the Canedy family; typescript of a letter (1794) concerning the transport of slaves from Georgia to Havana; a typescript with manuscript notes concerning the anti-slavery movement; and clippings (1939) from Massachusetts newspapers concerning the abolitionist movement.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the Rubenstein to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Papers, 1931-1939 and n.d., David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using MARC2EAD-SecA.xsl, December 2016.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Historian and resident of Fall River, Mass.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Letter concerning school teachers of the Canedy family; typescript of a letter (1794) concerning the transport of slaves from Georgia to Havana; a typescript with manuscript notes concerning the anti-slavery movement; and clippings (1939) from Massachusetts newspapers concerning the abolitionist movement.
